Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ca.publisher

Class PublisherSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.ejb.ca.publisher.PublisherSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublisherSession, PublisherSessionLocal, PublisherSessionRemote
    public class PublisherSessionBean
extends Object
implements PublisherSessionLocal, PublisherSessionRemote
    Handles management of Publishers.
    Version:

      • storeCertificate

        public boolean storeCertificate​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                Collection<Integer> publisherids,
                                CertificateDataWrapper certWrapper,
                                String password,
                                String userDN,
                                ExtendedInformation extendedinformation)
                         throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublisherSession
        Stores the certificate to the given collection of publishers. See BasePublisher class for further documentation about function
        Specified by:
        storeCertificate in interface PublisherSession
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        publisherids - a Collection (Integer) of publisher IDs.
        certWrapper - cart
        password - pwd
        userDN - dn
        extendedinformation - info
        Returns:
        true if successful result on all given publishers, if the publisher is configured to not publish the certificate (for example publishing an active certificate when the publisher only publishes revoked), true is still returned because the publishing operation succeeded even though the publisher did not publish the certificate.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if access is denied to the CA issuing incert
        See Also:
        BasePublisher

      • storeCertificate

        public boolean storeCertificate​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                Collection<Integer> publisherids,
                                String fingerprint,
                                String password,
                                String userDN,
                                ExtendedInformation extendedinformation)
                         throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublisherSession
        Performs the same operation as the other storeCertificate method in this class, but performs a lookup for a CertificateData and Base64CertData object. To avoid unnecessary database lookups, only use this method where the CertificateData object isn't immediately available.
        Specified by:
        storeCertificate in interface PublisherSession
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        publisherids - ID
        fingerprint - fp
        password - pwd
        userDN - DN
        extendedinformation - info
        Returns:
        bool
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        publisherids - a Collection (Integer) of publisherids.
        incrl - crl
        cafp - fp
        number - num
        issuerDn - the issuer of this CRL

                        String name,
                        BasePublisher publisher)

                        AuthorizationDeniedException

        Adds a publisher to the database.
        Specified by:
        addPublisher in interface PublisherSession

        name - the name of the publisher to add.
        publisher - the publisher to add
        Returns:
        the publisher ID as added
        Throws:
        PublisherExistsException - if publisher already exists.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher

      • removePublisherInternal

        public void removePublisherInternal​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                    String name)
                             throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublisherSessionLocal
        Removes publisher data. Ignores if there are any references to the publisher from CA, certificate profiles or Multi Group Publishers, just goes ahead and removes it.
        Specified by:
        removePublisherInternal in interface PublisherSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of admin.
        name - the name of the publisher to remove.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher

      • removePublisher

        public void removePublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                            String name)
                     throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                            ReferencesToItemExistException
        Description copied from interface: PublisherSession
        Removes a publisher. References to the publisher from CA, certificate profiles and Multi Group Publishers are checked.
        Specified by:
        removePublisher in interface PublisherSession
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of admin.
        name - the name of the publisher to remove.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher
        ReferencesToItemExistException - if references exist from other items in the database.
